column2: SELECT TOP # lt.Name, lt.RA as ra, lt.Dec as dec, lt.dist as dist, lt.i as incl, lt.metal as ltOH, lt.SFR as ltSFR, lt.TT as ltTT, n.objid, n.distance * #. as distance, log1# (n.distance * #.) as log_distance, s.z, s.zErr, s.velDisp, s.velDispErr, s.snMedian, g.ra as sdss_ra, g.dec as sdss_dec, g.objID, g.fiberMag_u, g.fiberMagErr_u, g.fiberMag_g, g.fiberMagErr_g, g.fiberMag_r, g.fiberMagErr_r, g.fiberMag_i, g.fiberMagErr_i, g.fiberMag_z, g.fiberMagErr_z, g.modelMag_u, g.modelMagErr_u, g.modelMag_g, g.modelMagErr_g, g.modelMag_r, g.modelMagErr_r, g.modelMag_i, g.modelMagErr_i, g.modelMag_z, g.modelMagErr_z, g.petroMag_u, g.petroMagErr_u, g.petroMag_g, g.petroMagErr_g, g.petroMag_r, g.petroMagErr_r, g.petroMag_i, g.petroMagErr_i, g.petroMag_z, g.petroMagErr_z, g.deVRad_u, g.deVRadErr_u, g.deVRad_g, g.deVRadErr_g, g.deVRad_r, g.deVRadErr_r, g.deVRad_i, g.deVRadErr_i, g.deVRad_z, g.deVRadErr_z, g.expRad_u, g.expRadErr_u, g.expRad_g, g.expRadErr_g, g.expRad_r, g.expRadErr_r, g.expRad_i, g.expRadErr_i, g.expRad_z, g.expRadErr_z, g.lnLDeV_u, g.lnLExp_u, g.lnLStar_u, g.lnLDeV_g, g.lnLExp_g, g.lnLStar_g, g.lnLDeV_r, g.lnLExp_r, g.lnLStar_r, g.lnLDeV_i, g.lnLExp_i, g.lnLStar_i, g.lnLDeV_z, g.lnLExp_z, g.lnLStar_z, g.fiberMag_g - g.fiberMag_r as fiberColor_gr, g.fiberMag_g - g.fiberMag_i as fiberColor_gi, sqrt (square (g.fiberMagErr_g) + square (g.fiberMagErr_r) ) as fiberColorErr_gr, sqrt (square (g.fiberMagErr_g) + square (g.fiberMagErr_i) ) as fiberColorErr_gi, g.modelMag_g - g.modelMag_r as modelColor_gr, g.modelMag_g - g.modelMag_i as modelColor_gi, sqrt (square (g.modelMagErr_g) + square (g.modelMagErr_r) ) as modelColorErr_gr, sqrt (square (g.modelMagErr_g) + square (g.modelMagErr_i) ) as modelColorErr_gi, g.petroMag_g - g.petroMag_r as petroColor_gr, g.petroMag_g - g.petroMag_i as petroColor_gi, sqrt (square (g.petroMagErr_g) + square (g.petroMagErr_r) ) as petroColorErr_gr, sqrt (square (g.petroMagErr_g) + square (g.petroMagErr_i) ) as petroColorErr_gi, #. - g.deVAB_u as eps_deV_u, g.deVABErr_u as eps_deVErr_u, #. - g.expAB_u as eps_exp_u, g.expABErr_u as eps_expErr_u, #. - g.deVAB_g as eps_deV_g, g.deVABErr_g as eps_deVErr_g, #. - g.expAB_g as eps_exp_g, g.expABErr_g as eps_expErr_g, #. - g.deVAB_r as eps_deV_r, g.deVABErr_r as eps_deVErr_r, #. - g.expAB_r as eps_exp_r, g.expABErr_r as eps_expErr_r, #. - g.deVAB_i as eps_deV_i, g.deVABErr_i as eps_deVErr_i, #. - g.expAB_i as eps_exp_i, g.expABErr_i as eps_expErr_i, #. - g.deVAB_z as eps_deV_z, g.deVABErr_z as eps_deVErr_z, #. - g.expAB_z as eps_exp_z, g.expABErr_z as eps_expErr_z INTO mydb.LITTLE_THINGS FROM MyDB.LITTLE_THINGS_RAW AS lt CROSS APPLY dbo.fGetNearestObjEq (lt.RA, lt.Dec, #) AS n JOIN SpecObj AS s ON n.objid = s.bestobjid JOIN Galaxy as g ON n.objid = g.objid
